sig_info: Medusa gains a Fury Buff every 3 seconds, up to 3 stacks, each increasing Attack by 15.13. Fury Buffs expire 14 seconds after reaching the maximum amount.
When struck twice, Medusa has a 12.03 to 89.97% chance to Auto Block with her hair, Purifying any Stun Debuffs, for the cost of 3 Fury Buffs. This can trigger Parry.

MEDIUM ATTACKS: Medusa slashes with her hair, breaking the opponent’s Armor and reducing their Armor Rating by 282.35 for 3.60 seconds.
ARMOR SHATTERED: When the Opponent has 6 Armor Break Debuffs, they are removed and replaced by both an Armor Shattered and Armor Break Debuff for 26 seconds.
While Armor Shattered is active, this Champion cannot inflict additional Armor Break Debuffs.
The Armor Break reduces Armor Rating by 1955.56 and removes an Armor Up Buff.

While Armor Shattered is active, Opponent's Armor Up Buffs suffer -100% Ability Accuracy. Additionally, this shatters Robot Champions systems, reducing their Combat Power Rate and Ability Power Rate as well as their Ability Accuracy, by 100%.
CRITICAL LIGHT ATTACKS AND ALL HEAVY ATT: 100% chance to inflict Bleed if Armor Shattered is active, dealing 1.78 Direct Damage per second until Armor Shattered expires.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Medusa inflicts a 4-hit combo, each breaking the opponent’s Armor and reducing their Armor Rating by 282.35 per stack for 6 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Medusa performs a 10-hit combo, each hit has a 60% chance to inflict Bleed if Armor Shattered is active, dealing 35.6 Direct Damage over 2 seconds.
Stuns the opponent for 3.50 seconds if Armor Shattered is inactive.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Remove all Armor Breaks on the Opponent and replace them with both an Armor Shattered and Armor Break Debuff for 35 seconds.
The Armor Break reduces Armor Rating by 1955.56 and removes an Armor Up Buff.
PASSIVE: An enhanced immune system provides full immunity to the Poisons of the Battlerealm.
